Pre-Game Insights: Houston Rockets have a strong defense, allowing only 106.6 points per game on average - third place in the league. They currently sit in third place in the Western Conference with a 21-11 record.Dallas Mavericks have three losses in the last four games due to Luka Doncic's injury. They are expected to miss about a month, which may affect their position in the Western Conference.
Others: The Rockets lost two consecutive games before the match against Dallas Mavericks, losing to Minnesota and Miami.The meeting with the Heat was accompanied by a mass brawl, the instigator of which was Amen Thompson. Forward will miss the next two matches of his team due to the incident.
